Name: PLA
Label: Plasma
Definition: amount of drug found in plasma

Name: ULU
Label: Uninvolved Lung
Definition: amount of drug found in uninvolved lung // (part of the lung where there is no lesion).

Name: RIM
Label: Rim (of Lesion)
Definition: amount of drug found in Rim (of lesion)

Name: OCS
Label: Outer Caseum
Definition: amount of drug found in outer caseum

Name: ICS
Label: Inner Caseum
Definition: amount of drug found in inner caseum

Name: SLU
Label: Standard Lung
Definition: amount of drug found in standard // lung EXCLUDING THE LESION

Name: SLE
Label: Standard Lesion
Definition: amount of drug found in standard lesion // (JUST THE LESION, NO LUNG)

Name: cLogP
Label: cLogP
Definition: octanol:water partition coefficient. This is the logarithm // of the concentration of drug in octanol (oil) and water - it's a // measure of lipohilicity/hydrophoicity of the drug.

Name: huPPB
Label: Human Plasma Binding
Definition: The fraction of drug concentration that binds to human // plasma proteins, (1 - huPPB) is then the free concentration of // the drug.

Name: muPPB
Label: Mouse Plasma Binding
Definition: the fraction of drug concentration that binds to mouse // plasma proteins, (1 - muPPB) is then the free concentration // of the drug.

Name: MIC_Erdman
Label: MIC Erdman Strain
Definition: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration of Erdman strain. // This is the minimum drug concentration that inhibits the growth // of the bacteria, in this case the Erdman strain of Mycobacterium tuberculosis.

Name: MICserumErd
Label: MIC Erdman Strain with Serum
Definition: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration of Erdman Strain WITH // serum added (serum added demonstrates a more similar to the // environment the drug acts in, in-vivo).

Name: MIC_Rv
Label: MIC Rv Strain
Definition: MIC for H37Rv strain of M. tuberculosis.

Name: Caseum_binding
Label: Caseum Binding
Definition: fraction of drug concentration that is bound to the constituents // of the caseum (caseum is at the center of the necrotic granuloma) (% unbound)

Name: MacUptake
Label: Macrophage Uptake (Ratio)
Definition: rate of uptake of drug molecules by macrophages. (I/E concentration ratio). // MacUptake is unitless (I / E concentration ratio)--this could refer to // concentrations inside and outside the macrophage I intracellular / E extracellular. // The time at which the measurement is taken is probably a standard one.

Name: dose_int
Label: Dosage Interval
Definition: When the dose is adminstered (QD reflects once // per day, and BID reflects twice per day)

Name: level
Label: Level of Drug
Definition: The level the drug was measured.(Either occurs at // the highest level (cmax), or lowest level (trough)
